messages.title: A message from your local Labour candidate, Clive Grunshaw
messages.content: You can see just how close the election is in Lancaster and Fleetwood. Only Labour can stop the Tories here, and a vote for any other party could let the Tories win.

messages.title: Don't forget to vote this Thursday
messages.content: This Thursday, 6 May, you'll be voting for the future of Britain and our area. The election here in Lancaster and Fleetwood rests on a knife edge between Labour and the Conservatives, so it is vitally important that you use your vote.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here in Lancaster and Fleetwood rests on a knife edge between Labour and the Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've spent the last two years going round our community, talking to as many of you as possible about your concerns. I hope that by now I have convinced you of just how hard I will work for our area, how I will stand up for the people of Lancaster, and how I will fight for continued investment in public services, new jobs and support our local economy.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RRYH-BRUH-SCAH, Clive Grunshaw, 47 Scotforth Road, Lancaster LA1 4SA
